EmailTemplate.name: Event - Accelerate 2013.Email Post Event - Rest of Database
EmailTemplate.subject: Watch Tricentis Accelerate 2013 Now
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<!-- -->
Dear {{Lead.First Name}}
Tricentis Accelerate 2013. Accelerate. Innovate. Automate. What a conference! We had a fantastic day, great speakers, and excellent interaction from all participants.
You missed the action? Not to worry – Watch the conference highlights and download the recorded sessions. Including, Theresa Lanowitz, Founder, voke, talking about Future of Driving Business Innovation: An Industry Perspective and many more.
We will also have videos and presentation decks from the conference on hot topics, such as Mobile, Agile, Test Management, Next Gen Test Automation & Risked Based Testing. <http://www.tricentis.com/about/events/tricentis-accelerate/presentations-preview/>
Thank you for giving us the chance to help you accelerate innovation at your business. We wish you all the best and look forward to seeing you next time.
Best Regards,
Wolfgang Platz
Founder & Chief Product Officer, Tricentis
If you have any questions or problems watching the videos, please contact us at events@tricentis.com <mailto:events@tricentis.com>
